trait.name: Asgardian Battleaxes
text: Made in Valhalla and kept keen with runic magic, Asgardian axes have a +2 enchantment and add a second die of weapon damage. Their magic must be renewed each week by a valkyrie or Odin's own hand.

trait.name: Battle Loving
text: Einherjars relish combat and never turn down a challenge to single combat or shirk a fight, even if the odds are hopeless. After all, Valhalla awaits them.

trait.name: Battle Frenzy
text: Once reduced to 30 hp or less, einherjar make all attacks with advantage.

trait.name: Fearsome Gaze
text: The stare of an einherjar is especially piercing and intimidating. They make Intimidation checks with advantage.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: The einherjar's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Multiattack
text: An einherjar makes three attacks with its Asgardian battleaxe or one with its handaxe.

action.name: Asgardian Battleaxe
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) slashing damage when used one handed or 17 (2d10 + 6) when used two-handed.

action.name: Handaxe
text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.
